resources.string: Err Not a valid FxNow address
Whether to hide contract calls without any FxNow amount or not
If enabled the app will start preselected in the wallet tab instead of the price tab
Sync interval to check for new transactions
Notify you about incoming transactions to any of your wallets

You are about to generate a new and encrypted offline wallet on this device. We recommend choosing a strong password in order to be able to ensure the best security possible for your funds. Please note that generating a strong and secure wallet is a highly compute-intensive task that can take up to several minutes! This process will be performed in the background so you can still use your phone as you usually would in the meantime. The progress is displayed in the notification bar of your device and as soon as we have finished generating your wallet, we will let you know.

You are about to import an unencrypted private key. We recommend choosing a strong password in order to be able to ensure the best security possible for your funds. Please note that importing a strong and secure wallet is a highly compute-intensive task that can take up to several minutes! This process will be performed in the background so you can still use your phone as you usually would in the meantime. The progress is displayed in the notification bar of your device and as soon as we have finished generating your wallet, we will let you know.
Or Choose Recipient from Address Book

This is the transaction overview showing all fnc sent and received to and from other people. After adding a wallet and transferring some fnc to it, the transaction and all future transactions will be displayed here.
You currently do not have any wallets. You can easily create or import one using the button below.
Welcome to FxNow - FxNow wallet is a simple to send and recieve coin. The FxNow Coin name is FNC.
Please read and agree to the terms of service before proceeding
I agree to terms of service
Please grant write permission to export wallets

We are currently generating a wallet for you, you can see the progress in your notification bar. Don\'t worry, we will notify you as soon as your wallet generation is finished :-) If you really wish to generate another one please wait for the current wallet to be completed first.
Are you sure you want to delete your watch only wallet?
! THIS IS A WALLET WITH A PRIVATE KEY ! IF YOU HAVE NO BACKUP AND CONTINUE ALL YOUR FXNOW ON THAT WALLET WILL BE LOST FOR EVER! ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO PROCEED? WALLET ADDRESS:
ARE YOU SURE? WALLET AND ALL COINS / TOKEN ON IT ARE GOING TO GET PERMANENTLY REMOVED. THIS IS THE LAST WARNING FOR WALLET:
No transactions found for this address.
Not enough Fnc on that Address
Please grant write permission to export Wallets
Please grant read permission to import Wallets
We have detected %1$d new wallet%2$s in our Fxnow folder. Would you like to import: %3$s
Watch only wallets can not be exported.

A copy of your FxNow wallet will be placed inside the folder \"FxNow\" in the root directory of your Android phone. Please note that other applications that run on your device can technically access any wallets that you have exported. Due to this, we highly recommend erasing all exported wallets from the fxnow folder as soon as you have finished backing them up.
In order to send funds you need a full wallet with a private key. Please generate or import one first.
In order to request funds you need a wallet or a watch only address.

Please place the wallet you want to import inside the wallet folder and make sure it is correctly named. When importing from FxNow Wallet(PC) or other desktop client you don\'t have to rename your wallet.
This may take a couple minutes
If enabled Fxnow will ask you for a password before launching the app
You can add extra data to send along with your transaction. If you don\'t know what this is then don\'t touch it or bad things may happen!

Terms and Conditions ("Terms")

Links To Other Web Sites

ASSUMPTION OF RISK

You acknowledge and agree that there are risks associated with utilizing an app service including, but not limited to, the risk of failure of hardware, software, the risk of malicious software introduction, and the risk that third parties may obtain unauthorized access to information stored within your device. You acknowledge and agree that we will not be responsible for any communication failures, disruptions, errors, distortions or delays you may experience when using our app, however caused. We take no responsibility for and will not be liable for any losses, damages or claims arising from the use of our app, including, but not limited to, any losses, damages or claims arising from (a) passwords being "Bruteforced", (b) hardware failure or data loss, (c) forgotten passwords, (d) corrupted wallet files, (e) incorrectly constructed transactions or mistyped FxNow addresses; or (f) unauthorized access to mobile applications, (g)"phishing," viruses, third-party attacks or any other unauthorized third-party activities.
